Description: Book of the Dead of Henuttawy; frame 1; full colour vignette.

Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, loss, varnished Black ink Pigment: loose, scattered Backed: linen Displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Displayed in Room 61 from 2001 until 2007 Loan to Japan 2012 'Journey through the Afterlife' exhibition.
